title: Gold R5s team LF ADC
body:
Hey guys

Spice Girls United X is looking for an ADC to play with. We're a tournament team and we're trying to enter as many as we can make once we get enough practice with an adc. We've been a team for a while and most of the players have worked together on previous occasions. Here are each of the member's names and roles:

Analysis (Top)
SalusFuFuu (Jngl)
EckyYakov (Mid)
ADC (N/A)
Olivia V (Support)


Here are the requirements:
Skype
7-11pm EST {Mon/Tue/Thur/Fri} -Tournaments Vary-
Silver 1+
Capable of being in a semi-serious tournament environment and taking a lot of constructive criticism from a VERY critical support.
FILL OUT THE APPLICATION

Application:
Current Rank(CR) Highest Rank(HR): 
Top 5 ADCS in order:
Do you have skype:
Do you meet the requirements:
Are you capable to attend most weekend events, mostly Sundays:
Can you get more than 27 farm at six minutes:
Age(not important, just information):
Can you land Tristana Ults: 
What is your playstyle? Be honest, during lane phase and after lane phase, elaborate if you can:

Any questions not answered in the post are to be directed to Olivia V. Please add Olivia V once you have submitted an application or if you have any questions. Thank you for your time!

P.S. Tryouts will come in no specific order, we'll simply talk to who is available and go from there.

replies.body:
Current Rank(CR) Highest Rank(HR): Plat 4 currently, Highest is Plat 3
Top 5 ADCS in order: Sivir, Cait, Lucian, Jinx, Kog
Do you have skype: Yes
Do you meet the requirments: Yes
Are you capable to attend most weekend events, mostly Sundays: Yes.  Generally no Saturday nights
Can you get more than 27 farm at six minutes: Yes
Age(not important, just information): 19
Can you land Tristana Ults: I don't play trist
What is your playstyle? Be honest, during lane phase and after lane phase, elaborate if you can: I'm agressive in lane, and I like to play lanes with kill pressure.

Application:
Current Rank(CR) Highest Rank(HR): CR S3-main, s5-smurf HR-Gold 1/plat5
Top 5 ADCS in order: {{champion:119}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:15}} 
Do you have skype: Yes
Do you meet the requirements: Depends on how liberal you are with the rank requirement
Are you capable to attend most weekend events, mostly Sundays: Yes I am
Can you get more than 27 farm at six minutes: I wouldn't apply if I couldn't, that's pretty low
Age(not important, just information): 21
Can you land Tristana Ults: If I have to play trist....not like it's a skill shot
What is your playstyle? Be honest, during lane phase and after lane phase, elaborate if you can: Aggressive, I like to being the dominating force in my lane and muscle out my opponents in lane and out, I am always ready to try for the risky plays and I tend to throw my weight around if I am fed or behind

Current Rank(CR): Silver 1
Highest Rank(HR): Gold 2
Top 5 ADCS in order: Jinx, Kalista, Graves, Ezreal, Lucian (can play most)
Do you have skype: Yes
Do you meet the requirements: Yes
Are you capable to attend most weekend events, mostly Sundays: Yea
Can you get more than 27 farm at six minutes: lol yea
Age(not important, just information): 19, 20 in August
Can you land Tristana Ults: Yes
What is your playstyle? Be honest, during lane phase and after lane phase, elaborate if you can: Tbh this depends on the lane matchup, how the lane is going, and how the game progress. I can play passive or aggressive depending on these factors.

Current Rank(CR) Highest Rank(HR): Current: Unranked.....Highest: I think it was gold 1 last season
Top 5 ADCS in order: lucian, jinx, vayne, ezreal, kalista....I can play them all except urgot haha. those are just my favorites i suppose
Do you have skype: yes
Do you meet the requirements: yes
Are you capable to attend most weekend events, mostly Sundays: yes
Can you get more than 27 farm at six minutes: yes
Age(not important, just information): 27
Can you land Tristana Ults: ummm it's still a target click right?.......even if its not yes I can
What is your playstyle? Be honest, during lane phase and after lane phase, elaborate if you can: lane phase: I farm of course, try to freeze lane near my tower as much as I can, harrass as much as possible while staying safe, position closer to the front of friendly minons. After lane phase: objectives, team fight, farm, objectives, objectives, objectives, teamfight, farm, objectives.....lol

Application for Calisstropfort:
Current Rank(CR) Highest Rank(HR): Unranked / Diamond 3
Top 5 ADCS in order: {{champion:51}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:18}}
Do you have skype: Yes
Do you meet the requirements: Yes
Are you capable to attend most weekend events, mostly Sundays: Yes
Can you get more than 27 farm at six minutes: Yes
Age(not important, just information): 23
Can you land Tristana Ults: Yes
What is your playstyle? Be honest, during lane phase and after lane phase, elaborate if you can: I like to be aggressive in lane if possible. I play differently based on the situation, sometimes you can completely zone them, sometimes you have to turret farm all game. Just depends on the champions being played. After lane phase ends, much of where I go and what I do is determined by the shot caller. In solo queue, I usually push my lane out, group and try to take turrets and get objectives throughout the map.

Application:
Current Rank(CR) Highest Rank(HR): plat 3, decayed to gold 1 because I was on holidays. Now in gold 1 promos as I've started to play again just recently.f
Top 5 ADCS in order: Vayne, Lucian, corki, kalista, jinx
Do you have skype: Yes
Do you meet the requirements: Yes
Are you capable to attend most weekend events, mostly Sundays: Yes
Can you get more than 27 farm at six minutes: Yes
Age(not important, just information): 17
Can you land Tristana Ults: Yeah,used to play her a lot back when she was played a lot. Can r flash ult. 
What is your playstyle? Be honest, during lane phase and after lane phase, elaborate if you can: Depending on who I'm playing and who my support is I generally try to get lvl 2 first then after we get lvl to go in for a bit of poke then back off. Cs till opposition makes a mistake or there is an opportunity.

Current Rank(CR) Highest Rank(HR): Plat5. Plat5

Top 5 ADCS in order: Jinx Ashe Vayne Lucian Urgot

Do you have skype: Yes

Do you meet the requirements: Yes

Are you capable to attend most weekend events, mostly Sundays: Yes

Can you get more than 27 farm at six minutes:  Yes

Age(not important, just information): 16

Can you land Tristana Ults: Yes, don't play her most the time though.

What is your playstyle? Be honest, during lane phase and after lane phase, elaborate if you can: 

Umm lane phase I know how to trade, know my damage, I'm a smart player know the game pretty well, usually just win lane phase, don't ever really lose it, I'll have that one rare game where I get hit by 40% of snares/hooks but that's rare. I'd aggressive but that has to fluctuate on how aggressive I am based on match up.

After lane phase I just listen to calls unless I'm the shot caller I mean as an adc what can I say? I position well is really the only play style adc's can play after lane phase.

Top 5 ADCS in order: Graves, Cait, Lucian, Jinx, Ezreal
Do you have skype: Y
Do you meet the requirements: Y
Are you capable to attend most weekend events, mostly Sundays: Mostly Sundays yes.
Can you get more than 27 farm at six minutes: Y unless they cheese or something.
Age(not important, just information): 20
Can you land Tristana Ults: Idk the skill shot is pretty hard to land ;P
What is your playstyle? Be honest, during lane phase and after lane phase, elaborate if you can: I am an aggressive player, however, I also tunnel on cs in mid game, sometimes I'm late to group because I was getting those extra 6 minions. However, my positioning in team fight is pretty good.

Current Rank(CR) Highest Rank(HR): CR - Gold 1  HR- Plat 5 (got elo decayed)
Top 5 ADCS in order: Jinx, Lucian, Vayne, Graves, Caitlyn
Do you have skype: Yes
Do you meet the requirements: Yes
Are you capable to attend most weekend events, mostly Sundays: Can attend all weekend events
Can you get more than 27 farm at six minutes: Yes (usually 70-90 at 10 minutes)
Age(not important, just information): 17
Can you land Tristana Ults: Not super practiced on Tristana but I can learn her if you're making a teamcomp
What is your playstyle? Be honest, during lane phase and after lane phase, elaborate if you can: Extremely aggressive in lane, I like to get ahead, then just shred from the backline late game.

Current Rank(CR) Highest Rank(HR):
Top 5 ADCS in order:jinx graves cait draven and ez
Do you have skype: yes 
Do you meet the requirements:yes 
Are you capable to attend most weekend events, mostly Sundays:yes
Can you get more than 27 farm at six minutes:yes
Can you land Tristana Ults:yes 
What is your playstyle? Be honest, during lane phase and after lane phase, elaborate if you can:My play style is to play to my charcters strengths in lane and usualy just farm up and trade when i need to. i reallly shine in late to mid game. try me out to see whats up

Current Rank(CR) Highest Rank(HR): Gold 2 / Gold 2
Top 5 ADCS in order: Ezreal/Corki/Tristana/Jinx/Graves
Do you have skype: Yes.
Do you meet the requirements: I sure do.
Are you capable to attend most weekend events, mostly Sundays: Absolutely.
Can you get more than 27 farm at six minutes: I would have uninstalled by now if I couldn't.
Can you land Tristana Ults: Point and click is hard dude, but I've put the practice in to make it work
What is your playstyle? Be honest, during lane phase and after lane phase, elaborate if you can: I like farm out and play cautiously until our lanes has an advantage (Allied jungler attention, numbers advantage, hitting a level/item powerspike) utilizing my knowledge of wave control to keep the minions on our side of the river without having them crash into the tower, whittling the enemy lane down with poke and maintaining a CS advantage until we have the ability to secure a kill. If we take a sizable lane advantage, I like pressing the enemy duo away from their lane and assuredly starving them out on CS & experience rather than going hard and potentially giving up kills and or pressure to equalize the lane back out. After lane, I prefer objective based play over solo farming.

ok so im gold 3 my highest was gold 1 and i play Jinx graves cait draven and ez. i have skype and  i meet the requirmets i can atend practice and i can get alot of farm. My play style is to play to my charcters strengths in lane and usualy  just farm up and trade when i need to. i reallly shine in late to mid game.
gold 3  Lucian,Jinx,Graves,Ezreal,Vayne can do all, play calculated agressive Pallyclark ign
